inclusion.criterion: Acute ischemic stroke due to occlusion of the MCA or ICA suitable for endovascular treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Symptoms onset between 6-24 hours from arrival to the time of femoral puncture
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hemorrhagic diathesis, coagulation factor deficiency, or oral anticoagulant therapy with INR > 2.0
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing neurological or psychiatric disease that would confound the neurological evaluations; mRS score before the onset of stroke must be ≤ 1
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hypodensity on CT accounting to an ASPECTS score of <7
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: CT or MRI evidence of hemorrhage (the presence of micro-bleeds is allowed)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Significant mass effect with midline shift on CT brain
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Occlusions in multiple vascular territories (e.g., bilateral anterior circulation, or anterior/posterior circulation) on CT brain
exclusion.label: met
